description.value:
You can procure information with confidence. Whenever you @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.actionsxprpg.Recall Knowledge]{Recall Knowledge} using any skill (including Bardic Lore), you can forgo rolling your check to instead receive a result of 10 + your proficiency bonus (don't apply any other bonuses, penalties, or modifiers).

As long as you are an expert in a skill, you meet the prerequisites for the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Automatic Knowledge]{Automatic Knowledge} skill feat in that skill, even if you don't have @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Assurance]{Assurance} in that skill.
